test.name: Verify "Gumawa ng account" Button is Visible

kw.name: Open the AppendPay app on Android
Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://appium.io/docs/en/2.1/cli/args/ | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@resource-id="com.multisys.append.develop:id/btn_register"] xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@resource-id="com.multisys.append.develop:id/btn_register"] xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@resource-id="com.multisys.append.develop:id/btn_register"] xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@resource-id="com.multisys.append.develop:id/btn_register"] xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@resource-id="com.multisys.append.develop:id/btn_register"] xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@resource-id="com.multisys.append.develop:id/btn_register"] xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@resource-id="com.multisys.append.develop:id/btn_register"] xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@resource-id="com.multisys.append.develop:id/btn_register"] xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@resource-id="com.multisys.append.develop:id/btn_register"] xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@resource-id="com.multisys.append.develop:id/btn_register"] xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@resource-id="com.multisys.append.develop:id/btn_register"] xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@resource-id="com.multisys.append.develop:id/btn_register"] xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@resource-id="com.multisys.append.develop:id/btn_register"]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.
